ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary: An opium-crazed Edgar Allan Poe trolls the Victorian internet in "Ligeia!" And, frustrated Second Amendment enthusiasts literally shoot "From the Earth to the Moon!" Plus, The Black Cat strikes back, and more satirical scribbles from the world's most horrific writers & illustrators! Painted cover by Richard Williams (MAD).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-30 14:11:56. [CVDB693487]
ComicInfo.Writer: Hunt Emerson, Rachel Pollack, Stuart Moore
ComicInfo.Penciller: Hunt Emerson, Rick Geary, Ryan Kelly
ComicInfo.Inker: Hunt Emerson, Rick Geary, Ryan Kelly
ComicInfo.Characters: Edgar Allan Poe, James Joyce, Ligeia, Lord Alfred Douglas, Nora Barnacle, Oscar Wilde, Pluto, Rowena Trevanion, Virginia Woolf, Vita Sackville-West
ComicInfo.Locations: Baltimore, Dublin, England, Europe, Ireland, London, Maryland, North America
